# bppg

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of bppg is to provide functionality to create and characterize bipartite graphs that 
    show the relationship between peptides and proteins in bottom-up proteomics.


## Installation

You can install the development version of bppg from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mpc-bioinformatics/bppg")
```
